name: Mustached Men Make Meatless Munchies
description:
A competitive versus sandwich stacker where one player collects ingredients for a veggie sandwich and the other tries to sabotage it by throwing meat burgers. 

Play two 1min rounds, one as the chef and one as the saboteur. The player with the highest score at the end of both rounds wins the game. 

The chef gets points by eating his veggie burgers. The more ingredients, the higher the score. If he eats a burger with meat on it, he gets minus points. 

The saboteur gets points if the chef throws his burger in the trash. 

Controls:

Chef: A or J - Move left, D or L - Move right.

Saboteur: A or J - Move left, D or L - Move right,  K or S - Drop meat burger.
